seo.title: Belarus Attractions 2026: Interactive Map, Routes & Tours
seo.description: Our site is a living map of unique places, curated tours, and the ability to add your own finds. Explore castles, nature, and hidden gems—use ready-made routes or create your own. Ready to travel? Let’s go!

mainSection.title: Belarus Attractions: An Immersive Journey
mainSection.subTitle: into History and Culture
mainSection.description: Welcome to our platform, your ultimate self-guided travel companion for exploring Belarus.

places.title: Intuitive Search, Advanced Filters, and Up-to-Date Information
places.description: Search by specific place names or regions of Belarus. Set a radius around a chosen area or point on the map.

card1.title: Palaces, Museums, and Castles of Belarus
card1.description: Each of these landmarks tells its own unique story, leaving you with unforgettable impressions.

card2.title: Breathtaking Natural Landscapes
card2.description: Belarus is renowned for its picturesque scenery, vast forests, and diverse ecosystems.

card3.title: Churches and Sacred Sites
card3.description: Belarusian churches offer not only spiritual enrichment but also a chance to connect with the country’s rich cultural heritage.

concept.title: [  Our Concept  ]
concept.text5: to its content. Anyone can share

placeCreation.title: Share Knowledge:
placeCreation.subTitle: highlight places around you!
placeCreation.description: Know a hidden gem in Belarus? Share it by creating a note on our site! Add photos, describe your experience, and pin it on the map.
